channel.title: What unique genre do people make in this community?
channel.description:
I know I created a relevant post like this somewhere and somewhen, but I guess remake it, why not?
When I mean ‘Unique Genre’, I mean a Genre that’s not House, Future Bass, or Synthwave. Correct me if I’m wrong, but I think Future House, Techno, and Progressive House are the type of House Music that aren’t unique (No Offense, that’s what I hear the most in this community ¯\_(ツ)_/¯).
I’ll go first. The unique genre I make is Drum and Bass.
You can include your songs that you didn’t made in Auxy. Also putting a link in isn’t required, but it’s optional.

item.title: What unique genre do people make in this community?
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
I think we all make all kinds of different hybrid music.

I guess I don’t hear anyone else but me making metal tracks in Auxy

Read full topic

item.title: What unique genre do people make in this community?
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
Whatever I make? Experiments in power electronics and death industrial. I admit these genres are more suited to analog synths and no input noise more than Auxy’s digital interface, but I do what I can with it. (Not a lot of listeners lol )

https://soundcloud.com/devoidofjoy/weltschmerz

Read full topic

item.title: What unique genre do people make in this community?
item.dc:creator: Thrashie
item.description:
Hybrid is my most used genre of music both with and without auxy, so I think I’m one of the very few who utilize it with auxy particularly. I would like to say I’m one of the earliest producers in the community to make that type of music with the app, but I may be wrong on that.
